mapper.insert: insert into iot.user (userName, password, createDate) values (#{userName}, #{password}, date_format(#{createDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))
mapper.update: create table if not exists iot.user ( `uid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userName` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL, `password` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL, `createDate` timestamp(0) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), PRIMARY KEY (`uid`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE INDEX `uid`(`uid`) USING BTREE UNIQUE INDEX `userName`(`userName`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 1 CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;
